<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.AddIndexesForCMDBTables</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>AddIndexesForCMDBTables</name> <script><![CDATA[var AddIndexesForCMDBTables = Class.create(); AddIndexesForCMDBTables.prototype = { initialize: function() {},
createIndex: function(table, fields, indexName) { gs.log('Initialize index creation for table: '+ table + ' on '+ fields); var index = new IndexCreator(table, fields, false, null, indexName); index.schedule(); gs.log('Scheduled index creation for table: '+ table + ' on '+ fields); },
type: 'AddIndexesForCMDBTables' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-12-14 01:32:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0eebefd377500110a69410ed9f5a991b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AddIndexesForCMDBTables</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">c60efc0f6d2220100acb70b3534330c0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0eebefd377500110a69410ed9f5a991b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-12-14 16:54:59</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>469</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
